text: and SVP of NEO Systems,

text: um, a private equity firm.

text: except for the founders.

text: They remain on,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: but we have the investors on the board, um, now as well.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And so this is a very timely, uh,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: session, uh, for, for our company.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Awesome. Thank you. And do we have,

text: have we done introductions for everyone?

text: Craig, did we get you?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: No, you didn't. Sorry, I had to jump off. Uh, hi everyone.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Craig Siegel. Uh, I am, uh, CLO at, uh, Hootsuite.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Uh, I'm located in Toronto.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Uh, Hootsuite is, uh, a social media management platform,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: so assists, uh, businesses with, uh, social marketing,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: social commerce, uh, 1200 employees.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, our board is made up of, uh, essentially, uh, founder

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and, and, uh, investor, uh, nominees.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Uh, we are looking at a, a bunch of different opportunities

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that, uh, could impact the, uh, the makeup of the board,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: essentially potentially looking to move to more

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: of an independent board.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Uh, about a year, year

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and a half ago, we moved from a founder, CEO, uh, who, uh,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: interest was, uh, not, uh, not that much into,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: uh, heavy governance.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And we've moved into a, uh, essentially a professional CEO

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: where governance is absolutely at the forefront.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: So it's a bit of a continuum in terms of, uh,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: strengthening our, uh, governance program.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: So, uh, looking forward to the conversation.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Awesome. Well really appreciate everybody giving some

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: context and background on where they are.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I'll jump in with the first question,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: but folks, please plan to jump in and help me out

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: 'cause no one wants to just hear my questions.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Uh, one of the things that, that resonated

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: with me in listening to everybody

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and their questions tonight is about the evolving role

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: of a board of directors over the lifecycle of a company.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: If I think about my CEO,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: he talks about the board having a responsibility

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to deliver foresight, oversight, and insight.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And, you know, different people can deliver

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: different parts of that, perhaps.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Certainly the role of the board changes when you're talking

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: about an early stage startup company all

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: the way through a public company.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And so, Kat and Ellen, I'm curious as to how would you

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: recommend folks like us think about the board and its role

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and how to interact

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: with them most effectively based on those

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: different stages of life?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Yeah, I'll jump in.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I mean, I, I think you start out as a,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: a newly formed company with a founder, two founders,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: they're on the board, and,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and there's a first step which involves some level

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: of giving up control, right?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And that's a, that's a big moment.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: You take money from someone outside, um,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: your board immediately changes.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: It's not just your company anymore.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: You've gotta, um, even if it,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: even if they don't have control of the board,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: most things are done by consensus at that level.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And you need to bring someone along with you,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: you need to report to them.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: So board meetings become professionalized.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: You're, um, you're preparing materials in advance,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: you're taking criticism and input.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, I think some people alluded to the importance

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: of who you recruit.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And Julie, I liked your, your, um,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I'm not sure I can repeat it, your foresight, oversight,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and insight.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Was it, um, that that's where I think foresight

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and insight are most important at that stage.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Perhaps, um, you know, you a board member

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that is also an investor that can come in

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and has, has been there with other companies

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and can see, you know, what the, what the dials are

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: for your company to help take it to the next level

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to prepare it for its next fundraising round to go

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to market, um, to, to penetrate customer bases

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that you haven't before.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, I think the board at that stage is, is doing a lot more,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: um, senior experience, business advice

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and strategy advice than they are governance and oversight.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: You know, the governance and oversight happens from your,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: your, your contractual documents, your, um, the rules

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and, and the fact that there's no more money coming if,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: if you don't do, do your job right

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and please your investors along the way.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, oftentimes at that stage, a board will have a, a,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: an empty seat for an independent director.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: You know, I often see this kind of board of five,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: two founders, two um, two investors,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and a fifth player to be named later

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that's gonna be an independent director.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: You know, I think that that independent director can be

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: worth their weight in gold if they are really a contributor.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: So, um, companies often wait a long time to find them.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: You gotta pay them usually, um, if you want 'em

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to, to do good work.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, if you move too quickly

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and get the wrong person, I think you can, you can pay

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: for something that doesn't add value or worse.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: You can, you can, you can pay for a director that really is,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: you know, closely tied to your investors

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and isn't truly independent.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, but when you find that, um, industry expert, um,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that is truly independent from you

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and independent from your investors, um, the value

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that they bring when there's a real problem, um, is,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: is immense, right?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I mean, um, when things are going well up into the right,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: what the board votes are,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: doesn't matter when there's conflict

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and there's disagreement

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: or there's gonna be recapitalizations, restructurings,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: layoffs, whatever it might be, executive changes.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, having a steady hand that is independent from purely

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: investor financial incentives and purely management

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: compensation incentives, but can help you think through that

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and lead through it is, is really valuable.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, so I think searching for, for someone at that stage

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to fill that role, um, can be important.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Your board will only grow from there.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: So I heard a couple of you talk about, you know, how do I,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: how do I get rid of board members?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, it's hard, right?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: So I do think caution as you grow your board is important.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: 'cause it's kind of a one way ratchet in a way.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, you know,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: there comes a time often when those two founder seats are

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: too many and the boardroom's getting crowded,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and maybe that second founder is,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: you know, is likely is not.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: The CEO is a, an exec that reports to the CEO

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and it may be less appropriate at some stage for that person

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to be in all of the board discussions.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, and, you know, there comes a time when

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)

text: And you know, that's where two partners

text: that have gone into business together, um, and

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)

text: and time devotion that they need.

text: Um, and then you start to, to attach observers

text: and additional investors and your board grows.

text: And, um, I, I see companies make the mistake

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: of being too generous with either observation rights

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)

text: to the board meeting that don't have observation

text: rights as if it's theater.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, I think you're doing it wrong if you're treating your

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)

text: with your investors, um, you know, for the board

text: to have an effective discussion for them to disagree

text: but to have a healthy exchange

text: and a dialogue that hopefully leads to a better answer.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I think a more intimate environment is important.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And so I would be very cautious about

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: expanding the boardroom too much.

text: And that provides context for, you know,

text: I still think it's a good idea. Um, and then

text: One, one funny tidbit around that one, just for

text: before our board meeting last summer.

text: And it's just a great example of,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: of people not really thinking through why

text: We need to be really smart about the information flow.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: for thinking through and, and,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and how do you see the GCs role in that?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Yeah, I, you know, I've seen it, um,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I've seen it go poorly and I've seen it go well.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I think to your, uh, illusion, Julie,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: about the private company context.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: One of the harder situations is when it's a VC from a prior

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: round that has a contractual right to that board seat.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And you've, you've not only gotta ask the the person

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to step down, um,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: but you've gotta ask the VC to, to give up their right.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: There is a middle ground there that I see sort of work,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: which is to allow them to keep their contractual right

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and appoint, you know, an independent

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to their seat that you agree on.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I don't love that solution.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: 'cause I think it, it compromises that incoming director's

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: ability to truly feel independent if they are, you know,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: at the, at the behest of contractually, at the behest of a,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: of a particular investor.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, even if that investor is saying,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I'm not gonna exercise that, right?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: But that can be a bridge too, right?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: That can be a way to allow the VC to save face

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: with their peers and not having to

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: give up their rights while getting the person

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that you want in the door.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And, you know, maybe nine months down the road that changes.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, I do think that there's a, you know, a hard conversation

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that has to be had there.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And usually it's the CEO that's, that's having it.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, it's another situation where I think having

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: an ally on the board, you know, um, can, can be valuable

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: because it, it's personal and,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and at one level you're telling, um, that director

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that you want off for whatever reason,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that you don't find their contributions

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: as valuable as the others.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And that may be who their fund is

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and what connections they have.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: That may be their actual level

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: of participation and engagement.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, you know, I guess it's easier if they are

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: openly disengaged or not attending or those sorts of things,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: but it's often more subtle than that.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And so, you know, the, the worst situations I've seen

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that discussion led to a, you know, a conflict

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: between the CEO and the director asked to leave

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that spilled out into, you know, the boardroom

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and was a public conflict and,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and people were left feeling, uh, feeling badly about it.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: At the end of the day. I,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I think the best situations I've seen, actually,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: it's a public company context,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: but I'm not sure it doesn't translate, were situations where

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: there was a chair who himself ultimately needed to

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: step aside in favor of new blood

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and, uh, open the dialogue, you know, a quarter in advance

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: with the board about what the objectives are

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and how, you know, we've got a board that is here

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and we want to get it to here for these reasons.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Whether it's diversity, bringing in more independence, um,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: bringing in more audit committee expertise,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: bringing in more operational skill sets to mentor the CEO.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, we need to achieve all those objectives.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And, you know, that's gonna involve some

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: transitioning of board members.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I, I'd like to hear from each of you what your, you know,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: continued interest level is in participating,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: but I'm gonna be talking to you about that dialogue

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and how we, how we order it.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And I, I think trying to get people focused on

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: why you're doing this in a way that is not personal to them

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and what, why it's good for the company

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: is good table setting and just framing it

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and then building a plan where the succession that needs

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to happen is staged over time.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: So, you know, maybe one seed is surrendered every year,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and that's known in advance.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: You know, we're gonna move out our series A director next

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: year, and we're gonna replace them with, um,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: an independent diverse board member.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And then in the second year, as we're a year away from IPO,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: we're gonna move out our series B board member

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and we're gonna replace 'em with an audit committee chair.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, I think also having a plan, um,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: you know, can, can let the other directors participate in

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: the plan, and it doesn't feel like that first person

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that got tapped is the one that's getting picked on.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Yeah, I would, I would just reiterate that the, um,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: for a lot of you, you are later stage private companies

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and, uh, the preparation for going public needs

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to happen far earlier than an org meeting.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, getting, getting a public company ready board needs

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to happen, you know, at least sometimes like 18 months,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: two years before you're gonna go out.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, in particular, just

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: because these days it's not just finding an audit committee

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: financial expert and finding folks

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: who can read financial statements.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, if any of you have companies

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that are headquartered in California, you have to comply

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: with the, you know, the California laws, uh, with respect

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to having, you know, women being on your board

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and underrepresented minorities on your board.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, and for anyone who is planning to list on nasdaq,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: NASDAQ just came out with their rules, right?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: So your board, uh, within a year of listing would have

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to have a, a woman and an underrepresented

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: minority, uh, on the board.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And so also with the increased focus from like ISS,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: glass Lewis and every single major fund from Fidelity

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to State Street, to, you know, BlackRock,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: they all have governance guidelines now

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and, uh, diversity, uh, and, and,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and focus on, you know,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: having effective boards is really, really important.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: So I think to Alan's point, like coming up

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: with a strategy far earlier than actually being public about

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: what is my board, you know, here to do

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and actually putting together like a rubric for

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: what I want out of it, and, you know, coming up

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: with actual competency matrices

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and who's checking kind of, uh, you know, what boxes,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and it's not just from a, you know, this is a,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: a diverse candidate, but you know, someone

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: who has operational background, someone

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: who has experience scaling my particular type of business,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: um, you know, someone who has experience on doing, you know,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: extensive m and a, if that's a big part of your,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: your strategy, um, making sure that you're kind

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: of filling those gaps and to Alan's point, planning

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: how you're gonna fill those

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and starting a conversation early with, uh, you know,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: with your existing board members about

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: how we're gonna reach those goals and transition to it.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: So it's a smooth glide into becoming a public company

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: as opposed to this being like a slap dash rush, right?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Like at an org meeting where you're frantically competing

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: for candidates because, um, as I'm sure many

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: of you are aware right now that the market for finding, um,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: independent board members, let alone people who can, uh,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: you know, folks who are women, folks

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: who are underrepresented minorities, it is, it's very,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: very competitive right now.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, and if you have to also be filling audit, you know,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: just audit competency, it's just, it's,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: it's a very competitive market.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: So starting the dialogue a lot earlier than you'd think

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: can be actually a mechanism for you to help maneuver, uh,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: maneuver your board in the direction

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: of going more independent, um, uh,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: you know, for the, for the long term.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Can I, can I push on that one for a second?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I think that probably depends on what, um,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: what your vertical is, what your market is.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I think you, you raised some really good points.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I mean, we're going public very shortly.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: We have a board that is, uh, five

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: of the nine are not white men, I put it that way.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Mm-hmm. That way. Um,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and it hits all our diversity requirements

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and then maybe harder for some, I think in other industries,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: if you're not an e-commerce in

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
