title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: You send out, you know, a competency matrix,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: qualification matrix to the board,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and people will sort of cross out as their competencies,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: all sorts of boxes, right? Um,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: They'll say they're excellent at everything except at

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: anything that gets 'em stuck on the audit committee.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Oh, there you, there you go. Right?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Look, someone who's doing middle market deals is not gonna

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: be the right person for somebody who's

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: a public company looking for transformational deals, right?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Someone who has done a lot of,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and you all should not take anything about our board

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: as a result of this, this, these comments,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: but just think about it, right?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Someone who's dealt with construction industry, all of his

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: or her life is not going to be the person who's going

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to be able to say, yeah, pay

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: 10 times the revenue of this tech company

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: because here's why it makes sense or doesn't, right?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Any thoughts, practical pointers on how you interact with

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: those kinds of situations?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: In my mind, right? Where I'm trying to lead this is

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: create a pathway of the two, three years down the road

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: where people who are not suited for those seats

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: eventually reach the conclusion that, Hey,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I've had a great run.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Let me put this in better hands here, if you may.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And, you know, and, and we'll, we'll invite you for dinners

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and drinks and whatnot,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: but boardroom is intended for that foresight

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and insight rule here, right?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Any thoughts anybody can share on this group

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that might be practical pointers would be helpful.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I can jump in, but we can see if the,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: the group has crowdsourced ideas.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Yeah. So, you know, I, I think one, let's be honest, most

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: of the time it is A-A-C-E-O

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: or a founder that is building, you know, their board,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: particularly at these stages.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And the relationship that he

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: or she has with, um, those members

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that have been recruited is important to this.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And so I, I'm not sure you rely on self-reporting

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: for each director to, to say what their skills are

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and if they scale to the next level.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I think, um, you know, I think the, the people tasked

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: with recruiting the board

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: or the ones that have to make their own assessment of that

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and about what the company needs, oftentimes that's a CEO.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: But one thing that's occurred to me in this conversation

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that um, uh, I I think is an interesting thought is,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: is there value in, in,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: in paneling a nominating corporate governance committee

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: at an earlier stage?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: It's not something that's required

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: until you're a public company.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I tend to not be a fan of,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I certainly don't want people building bureaucracy

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: or building committees

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and structure that you're not going to use.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, however, on that, the other side of

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that coin is when you impanel something like a committee

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and give it a charter, it tends to do things.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And, you know, that may be a way,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: if you have the right people to, um, to join it

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and lead it to, to create some leadership and,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and activism around thinking about this issue

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and being proactive in terms of how

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to shape the board in conjunction with the CEO's needs.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: You know, it's interesting. We did a, an exercise at one

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: of my companies where we did that competency chart

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and we asked directors to fill it out

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and we debated having the nominating corporate governance

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: committee fill it out for the whole board,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and ultimately we're pushed

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to have each director self-report,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: which was really an interesting lesson in who's an easy

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: grader and who's a hard grader.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, ultimately though, we used that as an exercise to try

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to identify a phenotype for a candidate search

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that we wanted to kick off that management was pushing

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: for an additional director and wanted to get

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to an alignment on a profile.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: You know, it can be a helpful way to try to do it.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And you can design that chart, right?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: You don't have to take a generic

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: chart that you find from somebody.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: You can design the chart to match

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: what you think is important in the skillset.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And, you know, depending on the honesty

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and the self-awareness of your board,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: you can have a pretty good discussion around that.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And to the point made earlier by Alan, like, you could have

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that at the, at a board meeting

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and you, you'd need a director to lead that typically

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: with a little bit of humility, right?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Somebody who can come in and say,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I know I don't get a five in every one of these categories.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: There's certain areas as I bring strength in other areas

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: where I defer to others, and that's a healthy dynamic.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I think you can set it up and have that conversation,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: but identifying sort of where the gaps are

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: can be a really important way as a first step

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to then saying, okay, how do we apply this to our board

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and say, do we have the right people?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Where do we need to go over time?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And you know, you, you often,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: if you sit in enough board meetings, right,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: you hear feedback about the CEO, you'll hear them talking.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: You'll say like, you know, you need mentorship in this area,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and you're like looking around the board table

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and you're like, well, none of you have that skillset,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: so maybe that's a gap, right?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: So there are opportunities where you can do it,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and I do think there's an important role that,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that we play in this discussion, right?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Even where the CEO might be the one

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to have the awkward conversation with the director, right?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: There's a conversation to be had with the CEO internally

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that says, here's where we are, right?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Everything's a continuum. We're gonna try to get

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to this later stage in our life cycle.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: We need to look like this when we get there,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: how do we plan for it?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: How do we get ahead of it? And those have been some

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: of the conversations I've had with my CEOs in, in the course

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: of my career where I feel like I'm adding a lot of of value

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and where I can be a thought partner for him

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: or for her to try and have those conversations

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and be proactive so

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that you're not sitting at the org meeting

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and going, oh, right, we need a financial expert.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Who do we have?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: So our company was recently acquired

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: by a private equity firm

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and they required the entire executive team

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to undergo disc assessment, um, tests.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And we all thought that was kind of silly.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, but once we got the results we were

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: after, we were all horrified at our own results.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: We were encouraged to share them with each other and,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and also we're trying to hire a new CFO.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, and they were required to take the DISC assessment

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and some people were eliminated immediately

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: because they didn't indicate the traits that were desirable

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: for the particular role, you know,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: but it also shows there, there's lots of stuff like how

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to communicate with people and so forth,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: but you can also identify, do these people have the traits

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that are associated with the role of a board member

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that you are desiring?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: It's really interesting. I can do it.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: We just did a disc for our executive team last week.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I did it for my legal team in July

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: because I think it's a really great exercise to go through.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I've done it, did it years ago at

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: TripAdvisor a number of times.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, we had the discussion about

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: as we add board members in the future, would we do that?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I think it's a useful tool.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I would add, and, and this is kind

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: of coming from our moderator, that like,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: don't use this as a hiring tool.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Like, I think it's a dangerous thing.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I mean, our, our executive team, I think like a lot of you,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: you'll find out if you've done it,

text: is gonna over index towards the ds.

text: I think that's sort of a natural,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: a natural thing in leadership, but just

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: because you over index there doesn't mean you want,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: don't wanna hire an I for your CFO,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: for example, whatever it may be.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I, I just think that's it.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: It's a tool, not something

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that should be used as a determinant.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, but I, I don't think

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: there's anything scary about it either.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And I'm someone who's a convert.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: 'cause when I first heard these 10 years ago, my god,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: more HR process stuff, that's a waste of my time.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And I acknowledged that I was wrong about it

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and I found it really helpful.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: But I also, it's a, I almost think it's a little dangerous

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to lean on it too much also.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Sorry Julie, I didn't mean to interrupt.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: No, it's totally fine. So I wanna make sure we also have

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: space for folks who have other topics

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: they want us to go into.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: So if there're folks who have other

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: directions they want this conversation to go,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I wanna give a pause and let folks jump in with questions.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: All right. Well, while folks are thinking I'll,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I'll take us in a slightly different direction.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, Kat

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and Alan, how do you think about best interacting

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: with your board, right?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: What are some of the best practices

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that you would recommend in terms of

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: managing the board relationship

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and managing how the board gets information flow?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, I'll, I'll throw a couple of thoughts that I have in,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: into the mix, but open

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to obviously others from around the room.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: You know, we, we think a lot about

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: how do we deliver materials to the board that are secure,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: but also positioning well for discussion

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and for decision making at the meetings

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and having this balance between pre-reads

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and discussion at the meeting and,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and not just reading slides to them.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I don't think anyone at any company feels like

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: they get it perfectly right.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: But I'm curious as to what you think are some best practices

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: because for us, you know, I, I struggle with the fact

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that I'm not confident that a lot

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: of folks do all the pre-reading,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: which is a really frustrating feeling, but a reality.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And at the same time, you know,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: you don't wanna be reading slides

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and it's really disheartening

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to the leadership team if you feel like you put all this

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: work into the materials

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and then you're sort of reading them

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to the, to the board members.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Yeah, I I think you're right about,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: um, no one ever getting that right.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I do a lot of board self-evaluations

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and I think it's commonly a topic from one end

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to the other for a complaint.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, I do most commonly hear directors asking for

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: more strategic discussion, more focused opportunity

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: for dialogue and less reading of slides.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And that's a common, um,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: common refrain I see in the chat folks saying, I, I'm not,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I'm skeptical that people do the pre-read.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I think you gotta count on 'em to do the pre-read.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, and you gotta think about replacing 'em if they're not.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: But, um,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: the pre-read can be voluminous.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I think, uh, having a common pattern so that people know

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: where to look for updates on the information,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: but also really doing an executive summary

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: or some way to highlight, you know, these are,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: these are the 10 things that jump out on the screen.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: They're not buried on page 80 that, you know, our,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: our CAC is going down or are we're having a churn problem

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: or, you know, whatever it might be.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, we're gonna call that to your attention so you see it.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And by the way, these are the three questions that I want us

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to discuss and focus on at this board meeting.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And so, you know, having that front

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and center, like the first page of the board package so

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that people can, um, can focus in on

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: what the key data is they need to pick up and then go deeper

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and they can start thinking in advance about

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: what the questions are.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, and then just from the, the governance perspective,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: this is a little more boring than that topic,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: but, um, preor organizing,

text: what is the approval agenda both from, you know, a list

text: of items that need to be approved,

text: but also actually drafting the resolutions in advance,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: you know, where there are blanks

text: or decisions that need to be made, you know,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: leaving that decision tree.

text: And clearly, I, I find these situations in board meetings

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: where that isn't done from time to time.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: You come away as, as council trying to draft minutes

text: and it's not totally clear

text: that everybody did agree on the same thing.

text: Um, getting it in front of them so

text: And so I, I like to do a meeting with, um,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: inhouse council a week before a board meeting.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: We work together on going through the agenda items,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: getting the resolutions drafted, running

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to ground any open issues

text: or problems, um, so that that's all prepackaged

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and ready to go and organized

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: by the time the board package comes along.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Yeah, I would, uh, so I think, uh,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: one point I think Meredith put in the chat was like the, uh,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I think that's the Amazon style, right?

text: Like Amazon starts every single meeting with like the first

text: whatever, 10 or 15 minutes

text: or for people to like literally sit quietly and read.

text: Um, I, I kind of side a little bit with Alan in the sense

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: of like, you know, you don't often have, you know,

text: or to, um, you know, one is, uh,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)

text: and then the actual presentation deck.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, and again, like also just making sure

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that you get the materials out with

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: sufficient advanced notice.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, you know, I definitely think for our,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: our smaller private companies, you know,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: board materials are often going out only like less than

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: 24 hours in advance.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Sometimes it's quite a bit of a scramble,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: but I think the expectation in particular as you,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: as you grow as a company is those materials need

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to be going out with, you know, needs to be more time.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, so the board actually has time to, you know, review

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and digest it, not just 24 hours

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: or 36 hours notice, um, for the materials.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And by the way, this is all more important in Zoom land

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: because, um, you know, you don't,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: you have people's attention for less time

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: or you should, your meetings should probably be sorter

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and more focused while, you know,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: we're in these virtual worlds.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, 'cause people get fatigued more, more quickly

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and it's harder to, um, have the, the, the triggers

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that come from, um, being able

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to lay eyes on people in person and

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and respond to conversation and, and human interaction.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: So I think focusing in the meeting on the key things

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that need to be taken away is,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: is ever more important in this world.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: But like there was a question there

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: that I talked over, who is Meredith?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Um, I, I just had a question about board portals,

text: you know, like board document portals and like why

text: or if people think that's really a valuable thing or not.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I mean I know that many companies use them

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and once you get a lot

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: of communications it's probably useful

text: just 'cause it's all in one place.

text: But I'm just curious if anyone has a view about that.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Yeah, so Meredith, I I have a couple thoughts.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I mean they're, in terms of which one to use,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I think they're a bit fungible,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: but I actually like them for two particular reasons.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: One is the security of the information.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: So the ability to keep your important information

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: behind some sort of secure system, not just email appeals

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: to me, but I also think it's really valuable

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: for folks in our seat in particular, right?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: It gives me a role where I get to step in

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and say, you know, we'll manage the portal,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: we'll manage the distribution material

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and everything goes to the board through that portal.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: It gives me a lot of, um, centralization of

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: how information flows out

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and puts me in the middle of it,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: which I think is good from a governance perspective

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and also an information flow perspective.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: 'cause I know what's gonna be going in front of the board.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: So I, I think selfishly I like it for both those reasons.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I don't know if other folks have different views.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: You, one thing you may wanna consider is there's some

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: literature out there in recent case law,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: certainly in Delaware on when some

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: of these things become discoverable

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and, uh, how to manage the

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: litigation holes and things like that.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Just making sure that, you know, the, the, the line between,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: uh, uh,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: what information should remain privileged is actually

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: remaining privileged and all.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: And I think doing that from uh,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: portals is much easier than using their own personal emails

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: or God forbid you actually provide them a company email

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: address and, and then, you know, have to deal with that.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Yeah, I I, I think actually that's a, that's a important,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: like, it seems like a small point,

text: but I, I think there was recent case law that came out of

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: where when you're emailing your board

text: and they're using like not, you know,

text: from in a, in a board deck.

text: we've certainly had things where we had derivative lawsuits

text: or other things like that where we were getting

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: advice or sharing advice.

text: That's what I was say. I don't put anything I have like

text: legal update is what I put in this slide.

text: Y yeah, no, or if you're just emailing out the materials,

text: the results for the quarter, those, those are facts, right?

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: Those are what they are. If you're talking about, I

text: Mean I'm, I'm talking about like just issues like yeah,

text: Oh we Had a, we had a quality issue like this past

text: quarter and like here's the download of it.

text: Yeah, I mean, I'm a big believer in thinking really

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: strategically about what should be in writing

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and what should not be in writing to Diane's point.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: I, you know, I think there are a lot of times

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: where you might put, you know, a, a topic for discussion

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: but not put the detail

text: to an exec session and bring it up verbally

text: and, and who's gonna have access.

text: And especially if you have investors on your board

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: and sharing it with everybody at their firm,

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)
text: which is something to think about.

text: You wanna be really mindful.

title: TechGC Virtual Dinner: Level Up Your Board(Jolie Siegel, C4 Therapeutics; Alan Smith & Kat Duncan, Fenwick)

text: of privilege along the way through that

text: Yeah. Loss

text: As well as with minutes, you know, I do,

text: they should typically be topic level items, not details

text: of who said what to whom.

text: And you know, what the background is.

text: 'cause um, you don't know where they're gonna come up again,

text: whether with other employees internally

text: And you can push back, but you may not win that.

text: that you can use them for secure emails.
